Actions.Name: Complete a job [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Marks a job as complete after successful retrieval of the processed file.

Actions.Name: Create a job with a file [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Create an ElasticOCR job for a supplied binary file.

Actions.Name: Create a job without a file [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Create an ElasticOCR job without supplying a file; supply a file later using [PUT] /v{version}/jobs/{jobId}.

Actions.Name: Delete a job [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
Delete an ElasticOCR job before it begins processing. Only jobs with a status of Pending or Uploaded may be
deleted.

Actions.Name: Download a job [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Downloads an available job's processed file.

Actions.Name: Get all jobs [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Retrieve all jobs and their current statuses. By default, a maximum of 1,000 jobs are returned.

Actions.Name: Retrieve a license [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Validate a license and identify the associated processing region.

Actions.Name: Update an existing job with a file [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Add a file to an existing ElasticOCR job. Only jobs with a status of Pending may be updated.
